stories.title: [Feature] Implement Role-Based Access Control
stories.userStory: As an Admin, I want to manage user roles and permissions, so that clients can only see stories shared with them and interact with allowed parts of the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin can define user roles (e.g., Admin, PM, Client).
Permissions restrict UI elements and actions based on role.
Clients can only view scenarios/stories explicitly shared or assigned to them.
Convex security rules enforce data access restrictions.

stories.title: [Feature] Implement Scenario Presets and Reset
stories.userStory: As a user, I want to load predefined scenario configurations (e.g., MVP, Full Scope) and reset my current scenario to a preset, so that I can quickly explore common configurations.
acceptanceCriteria: A selection of predefined presets (e.g., 'MVP', 'Recommended', 'Empty') is available.
Loading a preset populates the matrix and settings accordingly.
User can reset the current unsaved scenario back to a selected preset state.

stories.title: [Feature] Implement Team Composition Impact Analysis
stories.userStory: As a PM, I want to adjust the senior/mid/junior ratio of the team, so that I can see the calculated impact on the project timeline and cost estimates.
acceptanceCriteria: Settings panel allows input for team composition ratios or counts.
Metrics panel accurately reflects changes in estimated duration and cost based on team composition.
Calculation considers potential differences in productivity/velocity for different roles.

stories.title: [Feature] Implement AI Factor Simulation
stories.userStory: As a user, I want to toggle AI productivity factor simulation, so that I can see the estimated impact of AI assistance on the project timeline and cost.
acceptanceCriteria: A toggle exists in settings to enable/disable AI simulation.
When enabled, metrics panel shows adjusted timeline/cost reflecting AI factor percentages.
When disabled, metrics reflect calculations without AI factors applied.

stories.title: [Feature] Add 'Clear Matrix' Functionality
stories.userStory: As a user, I want a way to quickly clear all stories from the scope matrix, returning them to the backlog, so that I can easily restart my scenario planning.
acceptanceCriteria: A button/action exists (e.g., in the matrix area or top bar) labeled 'Clear Matrix'.
Clicking the button prompts for confirmation.
Upon confirmation, all stories are removed from the matrix cells and appear back in the backlog.
Metrics panel updates to reflect the empty matrix.

stories.title: [Polish] Enhance Backlog & Story Details View
stories.userStory: As a user, I want to easily view full story details in the backlog and ensure clients have a read-only view, so that information is accessible and presented correctly.
acceptanceCriteria: Stories listed in the Backlog Manager are expandable to show all details (user story, points, value, criteria, etc.).
The story detail view within the backlog is clearly non-editable for roles without edit permissions.
Story details are consistently displayed in both the backlog and matrix views.

stories.title: [Polish] Add Effort/Value Mismatch Feedback
stories.userStory: As a user, I want clear feedback when dragging a story might cause an effort or value mismatch, so that I understand the implications of my placement.
acceptanceCriteria: When dragging a story over a matrix cell, if the story's value doesn't match the cell's value, a visual warning or tooltip appears.
If dropping a story would cause an effort mismatch (e.g., points exceed column capacity), a prompt appears asking for confirmation or adjustment.
A distinct visual indicator (e.g., icon, border color) highlights stories placed in cells where their business value doesn't match the cell's value category.

stories.title: [Polish] Add Drag-and-Drop Interaction Hints
stories.userStory: As a user, I want clear visual hints during drag-and-drop, so that I know where I can drop a story and what will happen.
acceptanceCriteria: Valid drop targets (matrix cells, backlog area) are visually highlighted when dragging a story.
Invalid drop targets provide clear feedback (e.g., disabled state, 'no drop' cursor).
Visual feedback indicates whether a drop will move or copy the story (if applicable).

stories.title: [Polish] Add CSV Import Support
stories.userStory: As a user, I want to import stories from a CSV file in addition to JSON, so that I have more flexibility in how I bring data into the tool.
acceptanceCriteria: The Import Stories panel provides an option to upload or paste CSV data.
The tool correctly parses CSV data based on expected headers (e.g., Title, UserStory, Points, BusinessValue).
Imported stories are added to the backlog.

stories.title: [Polish] Improve Loading State Indicators
stories.userStory: As a user, I want to see clear loading indicators during operations like saving/loading scenarios or importing stories, so that I know the system is working.
acceptanceCriteria: Spinners or skeleton loaders are displayed during Convex backend calls.
Buttons are disabled and show a loading state during submission (e.g., Save Scenario).
Progress indicators are shown for potentially long operations like large imports.

stories.title: [Polish] Improve Error Handling & Messaging
stories.userStory: As a user, I want to see clear, user-friendly error messages when something goes wrong, so that I understand the problem and how to potentially fix it.
acceptanceCriteria: Backend errors from Convex are caught and displayed gracefully (e.g., via toast notifications).
Input validation errors are clearly indicated next to the relevant fields.
Import/Export errors provide specific feedback about the issue (e.g., incorrect format, missing data).

stories.title: [Polish] Ensure Consistent UI/UX & Responsiveness
stories.userStory: As a user, I want the application to have a consistent visual style and layout, and be usable on different screen sizes, so that it feels professional and easy to use.
acceptanceCriteria: Consistent use of colors, fonts, spacing, and components across all views.
Layout adapts gracefully to common device widths (desktop, tablet, mobile).
Key interactions (drag-and-drop, form inputs) remain functional on touch devices.

stories.title: [Task] Conduct Accessibility (A11y) Audit & Remediation
stories.userStory: As a developer, I want to ensure the application meets basic accessibility standards, so that users with disabilities can effectively use the tool.
acceptanceCriteria: Keyboard navigation allows access to all interactive elements in a logical order.
Sufficient color contrast is used for text and UI elements.
Core components use appropriate ARIA roles and attributes where needed.
Images have descriptive alt text.

stories.title: [Task] Conduct Performance Review & Optimization
stories.userStory: As a developer, I want to identify and address any performance bottlenecks, so that the application feels responsive and efficient.
acceptanceCriteria: Review React component rendering to minimize unnecessary updates.
Analyze Convex query performance and add indexing if required.
Optimize calculation logic within the frontend (e.g., metrics calculation).
Check application bundle size for potential improvements.

stories.title: [Task] Conduct Security Review
stories.userStory: As a developer, I want to review the application for potential security vulnerabilities, so that user data and application integrity are protected.
acceptanceCriteria: Review Convex security rules for database access control.
Validate input handling on both frontend and backend to prevent injection attacks.
Ensure authentication and session management are secure.
Check dependencies for known vulnerabilities.

stories.title: [Task] Improve Test Coverage
stories.userStory: As a developer, I want to increase unit and integration test coverage for critical components and logic, so that regressions can be caught early.
acceptanceCriteria: Add unit tests for key utility functions and calculation logic.
Add integration tests for core user flows (e.g., adding story to matrix, saving scenario).
Set up automated testing in CI/CD pipeline (if applicable).

stories.title: [Task] Improve Documentation
stories.userStory: As a developer, I want clear code comments and updated project documentation, so that the codebase is easier to understand and maintain.
acceptanceCriteria: Add JSDoc/TSDoc comments to complex functions and components.
Update README.md with current setup, build, and run instructions.
Document the Convex schema and key backend functions.
